text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: 'amar rabiy baledl, wamrkm bi'ana tkhlsu lah alebadt fi kl mawdie min mwadeha, wabikhasat fi almsajd, wa'ana tdewh mukhlisin lah alttaeat walebadt, wa'ana tuminuu balbeth baed almwt. wakama 'ana allah awjdkm min aledm fa'iinah qadir ealaa 'iieadat alhayat 'iilaykum maratan akhra
